long_description: The Ruffwear Stow 'n Go leash equips you and your dog with everything you need for the daily walk. The leash features an integrated collar and a disposable bag dispenser. Thread the 6 ft. leash through the included D-ring to create an integrated collar. Case features a dispenser for disposable bags (not included), and it's the perfect place to stow the leash when not in use. Closeout.
short_description: The Ruffwear Stow 'n Go leash equips you and your dog with everything you need for the daily walk. The leash features an integrated collar and a disposable bag dispenser.
